clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: It is used for treating nasal congestion and minor inflammation due to allergies or colds

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Xylometazoline is a direct acting sympathomimetic adrenergic alpha agonist used to induce systemic vasoconstriction thereby decreasing nasal congestion The sympathomimetic action of xylometazoline constricts the smaller arterioles of the nasal passages producing a prolonged 8 12 hours decongesting effect
